group_1.textRight: There are more pressing matters! Like, for@instance, the Blank Prophecy!
We can return to the battlegrounds at Patay.

group_1.narration: [textBlack:I beg of you, please... Let us make in time!]

group_1.textCenter: Is that La Pucelle...? You picked a fine time@to show up.
It doesn't matter though. It's clear you're@far, far too late!

group_1.textRight: (Every one of them has the Black Plague...)

group_1.textLeft: Ah ha ha ha haaa! There's not a soul left@here you can save.
Not your friends, nor those soldiers writhing@on the brink of death!

group_1.textRight: You... You've infected your very own allies@with this plague!

group_1.textLeft: What do I care about them?!
My magic hands out death to all, without@discrimination.
All of them can crumble away into dust!
The weak are bound to die, don't you know@that?

group_1.textRight: I won't let you do this.

group_1.textCenter: I have only ever had one simple goal, which@was to save my country.
That is why I have never felt hatred for you@and your sisters, who stood in my way.
I never despised you, as enemies...

group_1.textRight: What's happening?! What is this blinding@light?!

group_1.textLeft: She's wrapped in that light... And now she's@taking a new shape!

group_1.narration: ― Darc ―@Now I can never offer you absolution for@attempting to bring everything to ruin!
― Darc ―@I will save all of them!

group_1.textRight: My body feels so much lighter...

group_1.textCenter: Is the Holy Maiden responsible for this@light?

group_1.textLeft: We were all on the verge of death. Did she@really heal all of us?
Us too? Though we stood against her?

group_1.textCenter: This can't be happening, damn you! You wiped@away every last trace of my magic!
(She's holding a sword made of light!)
This...this can't be how it ends... [chara:402501:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:402501:lipSynch_1]Not to@a power like that...

group_1.textLeft: I can't believe I'm saying this, but I'm so@glad you're here. I can't thank you enough!

group_1.textRight: Please, there is no need for thanks.

group_1.narration: "Since I have no more use for you."

group_1.textRight: You used so many of those maids that@we had gathered on yourself.
Those were for HER, not you...

group_1.textLeft: I had to! I needed to be stronger, so I could@protect you and Lapin...

group_1.textRight: Then it's as I thought. You gave up on her@a long time ago.

group_1.textLeft: Why won't you LISTEN to me?! Don't you@understand how much I love you?!

group_1.textRight: I no longer hold a single drop of love in@my heart for you.
